<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"创建分支"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v5/repos/{owner}/{repo}/branches"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>





<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"owner","in":"path","description":"仓库所属空间地址(企业、组织或个人的地址path)","required":true,"example":"","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"repo","in":"path","description":"仓库路径(path)","required":true,"example":"","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"required":["branch_name","refs"],"type":"object","properties":{"refs":{"type":"string","description":"起点名称, 默认：master"},"branch_name":{"type":"string","description":"新创建的分支名称"}},"title":"CreateBranchesReq"},"example":""}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"OK","content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"name":{"type":"string"},"commit":{"type":"object","properties":{"sha":{"type":"string"},"date":{"type":"string"}},"title":"Commit"},"protected":{"type":"boolean"}},"title":"BranchResp"}}},"headers":{}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
